languages.text: {n}Хейнрикс колеблется еще мгновение — а затем склоняется над когитаторами.{/n} "К каждому мутанту подведены кабели. Даже не вникая в природу этих машин, мне не так сложно поднять напряжение... вот этот переключатель..."

traits.locale_text: {n}Хейнрикс колеблется еще мгновение — а затем склоняется над когитаторами.{/n} "Не так сложно поднять напряжение... вот этот переключатель..."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: {n}Heinrix wavers for another moment, and then leans over the cogitators.{/n} "Each mutant has cables attached. I may not know the nature of these machines, but it isn't too difficult to increase the voltage... Ah, this switch here..."
languages.original_text: {n}Хейнрикс колеблется еще мгновение — а затем склоняется над когитаторами.{/n} "К каждому мутанту подведены кабели. Даже не вникая в природу этих машин, мне не так сложно поднять напряжение... вот этот переключатель..."

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix wavers for another moment, and then leans over the cogitators.{/n} "Each mutant has cables attached. I may not know the nature of these machines, but it isn't too difficult to increase the voltage... Ah, this switch here..."

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix wavers for another moment, and then leans over the cogitators.{/n} "Each mutant has cables attached. I may not know the nature of these machines, but it isn't too difficult to increase the voltage... Ah, this switch here..."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix wavers for another moment, and then leans over the cogitators.{/n} "Each mutant has cables attached. I may not know the nature of these machines, but it isn't too difficult to increase the voltage... Ah, this switch here..."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: {n}海因里希又犹豫了一会儿，之后俯身检查起了沉思者。{/n}“每只变异生物身上都连着电缆。我可能并不清楚这些机器的原理，但想提高电压应该并不困难……啊，找到开关了……”
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix wavers for another moment, and then leans over the cogitators.{/n} "Each mutant has cables attached. I may not know the nature of these machines, but it isn't too difficult to increase the voltage... Ah, this switch here..."

traits.locale_text: {n}海因里希又犹豫了一会儿，之后俯身检查起了思考器。{/n}“每只变异生物身上都连着电缆。我可能并不清楚这些机器的原理，但想提高电压应该并不困难……啊，找到开关了……”
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: {n}Heinrix titubea otra vez y se inclina sobre los cogitadores.{/n} «Todos estos mutantes tienen acoplados unos cables. Aunque no sé para qué sirven estas máquinas, aumentar el voltaje no es difícil... Ah, aquí está el interruptor...».
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix wavers for another moment, and then leans over the cogitators.{/n} "Each mutant has cables attached. I may not know the nature of these machines, but it isn't too difficult to increase the voltage... Ah, this switch here..."

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix titubea otra vez y se inclina sobre los cogitadores.{/n} «Todos estos mutantes tienen acoplados unos cables. Aunque no sé para qué sirven estas máquinas, aumentar el voltaje no es difícil... Ah, aquí está el interruptor...».
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: {n}ハインリックスはしばらく逡巡した後、考算機の上に身を乗り出した。{/n}「それぞれの変異体にはケーブルがついています。この機械の性質はよくわかりませんが、電圧を上げるのはそれほど難しくないでしょう…ああ、これがスイッチか…」
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix wavers for another moment, and then leans over the cogitators.{/n} "Each mutant has cables attached. I may not know the nature of these machines, but it isn't too difficult to increase the voltage... Ah, this switch here..."

traits.locale_text: {n}ハインリックスはしばらく逡巡した後、考算機の上に身を乗り出した。{/n}「それぞれの変異体にはケーブルがついています。この機械の性質はよくわかりませんが、電圧を上げるのはそれほど難しくないでしょう…ああ、これがスイッチか…」
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: {n}Heinrix zögert noch einen Moment und beugt sich dann über die Cogitatoren.{/n} "An jedem Mutanten sind Kabel angeschlossen. Ich kenne zwar den Aufbau dieser Maschinen nicht, aber es wäre nicht schwer, die Spannung zu erhöhen ... Ah, der Schalter hier ..."
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix wavers for another moment, and then leans over the cogitators.{/n} "Each mutant has cables attached. I may not know the nature of these machines, but it isn't too difficult to increase the voltage... Ah, this switch here..."

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix zögert noch einen Moment und beugt sich dann über die Cogitatoren.{/n} "An jedem Mutanten sind Kabel angeschlossen. Ich kenne zwar den Aufbau dieser Maschinen nicht, aber es wäre nicht schwer, die Spannung zu erhöhen ... Ah, der Schalter hier ..."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: {n}Heinrix hésite un instant de plus, avant de se pencher sur les cogitateurs.{/n} « Des câbles sont branchés sur chaque mutant. Même si j'ignore la nature de ces machines, il n'est pas compliqué d'augmenter la tension électrique... Ah, cet interrupteur... »
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix wavers for another moment, and then leans over the cogitators.{/n} "Each mutant has cables attached. I may not know the nature of these machines, but it isn't too difficult to increase the voltage... Ah, this switch here..."

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix hésite un instant de plus, avant de se pencher sur les cogitateurs.{/n} « Des câbles sont branchés sur chaque mutant. Même si j'ignore la nature de ces machines, il n'est pas compliqué d'augmenter la tension électrique... Ah, cet interrupteur... »
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: {n}Heinrix, bir müddet daha duraksayıp kavramsayarların üzerine eğiliyor.{/n} "Her mutantın kendi kablosu var. Bu makinelerin doğasını bilmiyorum ama voltajı artırmak pek de zor olmasa gerek... Hah, işte şu düğme..."
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix wavers for another moment, and then leans over the cogitators.{/n} "Each mutant has cables attached. I may not know the nature of these machines, but it isn't too difficult to increase the voltage... Ah, this switch here..."

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix, bir müddet daha duraksayıp kavramsayarların üzerine eğiliyor.{/n} “Her mutantın kendi kablosu var. Bu makinelerin doğasını bilmiyorum ama voltajı artırmak pek de zor olmasa gerek... Hah, işte şu düğme...”
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion
